item.title: Russian Loanwords in Sakha
item.description: Russian language has a huge influence over the native languages of Russia for last few centuries. Yakut/Sakha is not an exception. Here is a list of some Russian loanwords in Yakut/Sakha language. Basically, you can use any Russian word in Yakut, since 99.9% of Yakuts who speak Yakut also can speak Russian, and they are often mix two languages. This is called code-switching, and every bilingual person knows how it feels.
